en.register_choose_tenant: Multiple tenants found for apartment {apartment}. Who are you?
en.register_success: Great! I linked your profile to {name}, apartment {apartment}.

There is already an open ticket for {category} (#{ticket_id}):
"{desc}"

Do you want to be added as a watcher?

Tap the Register button below ğŸ”‘

Youâ€™re registered! ğŸ‰

en.payment_send_proof_photo_or_file: Please send a screenshot or a file as proof of payment.

en.payment_amount_received_send_proof: Got it ğŸ‘ Now please send a screenshot / file as proof of payment.

en.portal_link_ready: âœ… Here is your tenant portal link (valid for 30 minutes):
